item.title: Integrating Puppet with Azure
item.description: Goal Explore how we can integrate Puppet with Azure IaaS (Virtual Machines). Result should be a method to create new VM’s that will automatically be brought into compliance with the appropriate Puppet Manifest Links Microsoft and PuppetLabs Azure integration: http://puppetlabs.com/solutions/microsoft Azure Customization Tasks http://azure.microsoft.com/blog/2014/04/24/automating-vm-customization-tasks-using-custom-script-extension/ Puppet Facter http://puppetlabs.com/facter Requirements When we create a new VM, we want that VM to automatically connect to our PuppetMaster, apply the appropriate manifest.
